hyperbolicOverthrall:SunWukongPreStrike.NAME: PreStrike
hyperbolicOverthrall:SunWukongPreStrike.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! * 1.5 damage. NL Discard a card and draw a card.

hyperbolicOverthrall:SunWukongPreparedMa.NAME: Prepared Materials
hyperbolicOverthrall:SunWukongPreparedMa.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Draw !M! cards. NL Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand gain [E].

hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultAttackWithVa.NAME: Special Strike
hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultAttackWithVa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theDefault:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultSecondMagicN.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
hyperbolicOverthrall:DefaultSecondMagicN.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theDefault:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
